s0089.literal: Appraisal says: During Emperor Hui and Empress Gao's time, the realm within the seas escaped the suffering of the Warring States period; ruler and ministers all wished to practice non-action, therefore Emperor Hui held himself in check, Empress Gao as female ruler controlled government, not emerging from the women's quarters, yet the world was peaceful, punishments rarely used, the people attended to farming, clothing and food increased abundantly.
s0089.idiomatic: Appraisal: In the time of Emperors Hui and Empress Gao, the realm escaped the sufferings of the Warring States era. Both ruler and ministers desired a policy of non-interference, so Emperor Hui restrained himself while Empress Gao, as female sovereign, controlled the government without emerging from the women's quarters. Yet the world remained peaceful, punishments were rarely applied, and the people devoted themselves to farming, their clothing and food increasing abundantly.
